metadata.title: CVE-2021-21775 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way certain events areprocessed for ImageLoader objects of Webkit WebKitGTK 2.30.4. A speciallycrafted web page can lead to a potential information leak and furthermemory corruption. In order to trigger the vulnerability, a victim must betricked into visiting a malicious webpage.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
